alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Ellis; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:17PM CDT until June 17 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Dewey County in northwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 917 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Higgins, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arnett, Vici, and Harmon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
